title: User Login Success
description: Verify that a user can log into the system successfully with correct credentials.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is successful and user is redirected to the dashboard.

title: User Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that login fails with invalid username or password and appropriate error message is shown.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email and/or password.
Click the login button.
Verify that login is rejected with error message 'Invalid credentials'.

title: Role-Based Access Control Enforcement
description: Validate that users can access only resources permitted by their roles and restricted areas are blocked.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions (e.g., Procurement Analyst).
Attempt to access a restricted page (e.g., audit logs, activation of pricelists).
Verify that access is denied with proper authorization error.
Log in as a user with elevated permissions (e.g., Inventory Manager).
Access authorized pages like product selection workspace.
Verify access is granted.

title: Supplier Pricelist Upload and Validation Success
description: Verify the supplier pricelist upload wizard accepts valid files, performs validations, and allows submission.

steps.description: Log in as Procurement Analyst.
Navigate to the pricelist upload wizard.
Upload a valid supplier pricelist file.
Verify that the system performs automated validations and displays success.
Submit the pricelist for integration.
Verify pricelist is queued for merging and reflected in the supplier directory.

title: Supplier Pricelist Upload Validation Failure
description: Verify the upload wizard detects invalid pricelist files and provides actionable error messages.

steps.description: Log in as Procurement Analyst.
Navigate to the pricelist upload wizard.
Upload a malformed or invalid pricelist file (e.g., missing fields, incorrect format).
Verify validation errors are displayed clearly specifying the issues.
Attempt to submit the pricelist with errors.
Verify submission is blocked until errors are resolved.

title: Enforce Single Active Selection Rule
description: Ensure that only one active inventory selection exists per product at any time and previous selections are retained for history.

steps.description: Log in as Inventory Manager.
Access the inventory selection interface for a product.
Activate a supplier selection for the product.
Verify the selection is marked active.
Attempt to activate a different supplier selection for the same product.
Verify the system deactivates the previous selection and activates the new one.
Verify previous selections remain accessible for history and analytics.

title: Real-Time Stock on Hand Reporting Accuracy
description: Verify that the Stock on Hand dashboard displays accurate and real-time stock levels and triggers alerts when thresholds breach.

steps.description: Log in as Inventory Manager or Finance Controller.
Navigate to the stock on hand dashboard.
Verify displayed stock levels match underlying database values for all SKUs.
Simulate stock decrease below threshold for a product.
Verify the alert is triggered and displayed on dashboard.

title: Analytics & History Reporting
description: Confirm multi-supplier price history and trend analysis reports are generated correctly and downloadable in supported formats.

steps.description: Log in as Finance Controller.
Navigate to the analytics dashboard.
Select options to view price history and trend analysis for multiple suppliers.
Verify reports display correct historical data and trend charts.
Download reports in CSV and PDF formats.
Verify downloaded files are complete, correctly formatted and match displayed data.

title: REST API Authentication and Error Handling
description: Validate that all REST API endpoints require authentication and return appropriate errors for unauthorized or malformed requests.

steps.description: Send API request without authentication token to an authenticated endpoint.
Verify response is 401 Unauthorized.
Send API request with invalid or expired token.
Verify response is 401 Unauthorized.
Send API request with invalid parameter (e.g., wrong schema).
Verify response is 400 Bad Request with validation error details.

title: Integration CLI Scripts Execution
description: Verify that Integration CLI scripts for schema setup, data seeding, and verification run successfully and produce expected results.

steps.description: Run CLI script to setup database schema.
Verify successful completion with no errors and schema is created.
Run CLI script to seed test data.
Verify data is inserted correctly into database tables.
Run CLI script to verify data integrity.
Verify verification reports success with no errors.

title: Audit Logging of User Actions
description: Validate that all critical user actions (e.g., uploads, selections, activations) are logged correctly and accessible for audit review.

steps.description: Perform key actions such as pricelist upload, selection activation, and report download.
Access audit logs via the audit log API or UI.
Verify logs contain entries with correct user ID, timestamp, action type, and details.

title: Pricelist Processing Time Performance
description: Ensure pricelist processing (upload through activation) completes within target performance thresholds.

steps.description: Upload large but valid pricelist file.
Measure time taken from upload to activation completion.
Verify processing time meets target reduction compared to baseline.

title: API Reliability and Latency
description: Verify the REST API maintains error rate below 0.1% and 95th percentile query response latency below 500ms under load.

steps.description: Execute load test with simulated concurrent API requests representing typical user activity.
Collect metrics on error rates and response times.
Confirm error rate is below 0.1% and p95 latency below 500ms.

title: User Adoption Metrics Tracking
description: Validate that system usage metrics such as weekly active users and time-on-task are captured and reported accurately.

steps.description: Use system for several typical workflows over a week.
Access usage metrics dashboard or reports.
Verify accurate capture of weekly active users and average time spent per task.

title: Security Compliance Verification
description: Check that audit logging, role-based access controls, and secure credential handling comply with South African POPIA and other regulations.

steps.description: Review audit logs for completeness and tamper-resistance.
Verify encryption and secure storage of credentials and tokens.
Test access control enforcement according to role policy.
Confirm all security compliance checkpoints are met per defined standards.

title: UI Responsiveness and Navigation Across Tabs
description: Verify the web UI at /nxt-spp supports smooth navigation across dashboard, selections, and stock reports with responsive design.

steps.description: Log in and navigate through tabs Dashboard, Selections, Stock Reports.
Verify data and UI components load correctly and tabs switch without errors.
Resize browser window to several screen sizes.
Confirm responsive layout adapts appropriately without UI breaks.

title: Pricelist Upload Security Scanning
description: Verify that uploaded pricelist files are scanned for security vulnerabilities or malware before processing.

steps.description: Upload a file containing known test virus signature or suspicious content.
Verify system detects the threat and rejects file upload with warning.
Upload a clean file.
Verify upload proceeds to validation stage.
